text: Exciting place for appreciating arts that is   " choice of the perfect art for your space". Variety of exhibitions from USA Europe Asia and Israel. Love the bold composition strong colours intense feelings and expressions. Conveniently located in Tanglin among luxury hotels upscaled shopping and dinning  few bus stop and free shuttle bus from Hotel Jen to Orchard MRT station with plenty of dinning shopping supermarket banking library postage cinemas entertainment and amenities nearby. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists expats locals visitors and families.
The art pieces are all at affordable prices.  They are cash and carry. They provide shipment for big items. Staffs are warmth and knowledgeable.

Katarina has been a very helpful and she was always ready to reply to you even when she was on holiday. She would give you a very helpful recommendation with extensive network. I got the painting that she arranged with the painter himself ( with some personal touch ) and delivered professionally. Even the delivery crews seemed were having a great working relationship with Bruno Gallery. The delivery crews measured using the laser measuring tool that I didnâ€™t expect this such service. Katarina and Yasin are friendly and they are very knowledgeable. Would definitely to get more paintings from them. Thank you for being patience with my requests even when it was not during business hour and you were overseas.
Wonderful staff, so patient to explain and share their knowledge... beautiful works there...thank you.
Great place to visit. Affordable price .Knowledge staff and interesting pieces.
